name: Scrash
description:
Each individual level brings a set rules with challenging arenas. In some matches, the objective is to hit the opponent with a speeding ball, whereas others may feature colored goals, breakable blocks, volleyball nets and more.MOVE fast and BREAK obstacles

A new level is loaded with each score, making matches as long as skills permit and as short as a blink. Wins the player with the highest score when the other yields... In shame.SCORE amazing goals and BRAG about your skills

Scrash is a new take on the classic arcade genre, bringing elements from the early videogame era. A tribute to breakable obstacles, air hockey and table-tennis all in one.OBLITERATE adversaries in DUELS to the deathHOW to PLAYTo play Scrash, you need 2 controllers (PS4 or Xbox, preferably) and a friend.
KEY FEATURES
  • Free
  • Local multiplayer party-game
  • No characters, no plot holes, no narrative
  • Responsive, tight and fast-paced gameplay
  • 7 Tailor-made levels to ensure the best experience after each score
  • Quick player-agreeable voting system to reset score and change levels
  • Minimalist look and feel lets you focus on what really matters: scrashing!
